name: DIRIZANDIN
description:
Centuries ago, shoes and slimes were in war. The shoes were crushing the slimes, the slimes were sticking to the shoes. Until that day. The Shoe Kingdom occupied the Slime Kingdom. After they killed the Slime King and Queen, they took Prince Dirizandin, the heir to the Slime Kingdom, hostage. Prince Dirizandin vowed to get rid of the dungeons of the kingdom and take his revenge.

It's a final project for Fundamentals of Game Design Class and Introduction to Game Engines Class. 

Made by Bahçeşehir University Students:

Cemre Sude Sayın
